(Sorry, I intended to send it private, but I didn't work... Oh well, 
add anything if you feel you have to!)

Hi guys! 

I'm Nic, or Azure as they call me, and I'm one of the council members 
for this rpg. Welcome around! 

Playing in the rpg is quite simple; since it's a play by e-mail 
(pbem), you simply state what your characters do and say. Since you 
say you've been on the website, you might have read the rules. Simply 
summarized: Have fun, but don't play the characters of others and 
don't be a god. Seems easy, but the step can be subtle! But don't 
worry, it's not that hard. 

The story for now is that the Beast Wars have begun anew after the 
Beast Wars series (Beast machine never occured, although there are 
techno-organics). First there were only Maximals and Predacons, but 
soon the Tripredacus came to get Megatron (who later became Hydras 
when he fused with Galvatron), a task that they yet have to 
accomplish. There are many storylines currently going on, but since 
there have been elections lately, the game format could change to 
something we hope will be even better! 

As for character creation, just follow the rules on the website. 
Since you can't really submit anything right now on the website, you 
can upload it on the Yahoogroups page (files link). State your 
faction (Maxies, Preds or Tripreds), your gender (if any) and a brief 
description of your character along with its armament. No more than 5 
weapons though! 

Be careful though; since you are two players, you should make two 
separate yahoo ID's, unless you want to play as a single player. It's 
up to you! 

Last thing (I've said a lot for someone just joining, haven't I?), if 
you need any more information, the other players are your best 
sources for advices. Not sure with a rule? Ask someone! What's this 
faction doing? Ask someone (preferably in that faction)! You don't 
know what time it is? Down to the right of your screen! (Sorry, it IS 
a bad joke...). 

I hope this helps you guys to get started! 

Have a good time around! 

Nic
